title: Athene's / Galio

replies.body:
Just another query
Does windspeakers proc off Galio W?
If so they need to fix  on him
If not they need to change Galio's W's description for clarity reasons
Haven't tried it personally, but a few peoples on other posts claim that it doesn't work.
the wording and animation just make it confusing, its an mr/armor buff with healing effects. they relly should update that.
Yeah the either need to reword Galio's bulwark, or fix the bug that it is not a shield.

Damn, that is most upsetting... Have you made sure you have landed a Q or E (or ult) before you cast W on an ally, since it relies on dealing damage I believe
Still early patch days though and this could be unintentional (I hope they fix it if that's the case) {{item:3070}}
Yeah, I have tested it with Orianna's shield and everything works fine with that, but with Galio the charges labeled on athenes don't go down and the ally isn't healed.

Damn. They definitely don't consider it a shield then
That is such a kick in the guts considering it's such a core item on him and it almost is a shield... God damn.
